titles.title: Human Rights Accountability Act of 2015
A bill to ensure the Secretary of State complies fully with reporting requirements in section 116(d) of the Foreign Assistance Act of 1961.
Human Rights Accountability Act of 2015

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary:
Human Rights Accountability Act of 2015
This bill requires that 5% of the funds appropriated or otherwise made available for a fiscal year for the Department of State's diplomatic and consular programs (and not designated for worldwide security protection) be withheld from obligation for every 30 days the Department's human rights report is late.
